Description: This guitar is like new. It has only been played around the house. It has never been gigged. I can't find a single blemish on it. This is a current model, available in stores for $800. Get it here for a considerable discount. Free UPS Ground shipping in the lower 48 states. Please ask for a quote on shipping to AK, or HI. The C-1 Custom Electric Guitar is loaded with Schecter's own Pasadena and Pasadena Plus pickups. With a large clear sound, these pickups deliver great tone that is both musical and articulate and versatile with a push/pull tone control for coil-tapping. The arched mahogany body has a gorgeous maple top and the set mahogany neck features Ultra Access that allows you to reach the higher frets with ease. It also comes with locking tuners and a TonePros tune-o-matic bridge.
